title: Use live OptProf data again
body:
Return to using recently-produced OptProf data in official builds rather than the last snapshot of the old collected data. This was enabled with #8737 but we hadn't turned it on yet.

This reverts commit d434c0e464ee0c119bdd5ee87b448e16fe0786be (#8497).

commit.message:
Revert "Temporary opt-prof fix: use old opt-prof from 20230217.4 (#8497)"

This reverts commit d434c0e464ee0c119bdd5ee87b448e16fe0786be.

nodes.body:
Internal build link showing it picked up the new bits: https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_build/results?buildId=7804819&view=logs&j=bb592630-4b9d-53ad-3960-d954a70a95cf&t=94418e61-6648-5751-f7d4-a14f4e5e2bb7&l=33

Experimental insertion (check green perf DDRITs before merging!): https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_git/VS/pullrequest/473417
